inputFieldCharDirectoryDescription: Location of files unpacked from field/char.lgp like AAAA.HRC
outputFieldCharDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output files like aaaa.hrc.gltf, aaaa.hrc.bin
texturesDirectoryDescription: Location of texture files like aabb.png, relative to outputGltfDirectory
inputFieldFLevelDirectoryDescription: Location of files unpacked from field/flevel.lgp like maplist, md1stin, flevel.siz, c_eye2.tex
outputFieldFLevelDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output files like maplist.json, md1stin.json
inputWMWorldUSDirectoryDescription: Location of files unpacked from wm/world_us.lgp field.tbl, wm0.ev
outputWMWorldUSDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output files like wm-field.json, wm0.json
inputBattleBattleDirectoryDescription: Location of files unpacked from battle/battle.lgp like rtaa
outputBattleBattleDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output battle models
inputBattleSceneDirectoryDescription: Location of raw battle data files like scene.bin and camdata0.bin
outputBattleSceneDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put out battle data
inputBattleDirectoryDescription: Location of raw battle data files like stage57.dat and enemy012.dat
outputBattleMiscDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put out misc battle data
inputKernelDirectoryDescription: Location of kernel directory containing KERNEL.BIN, kernel2.bin, WINDOW.BIN
outputKernelDirectoryDescription: Location of kernel directory containing KERNEL.BIN, kernel2.bin, WINDOW.BIN
inputMenuDirectoryDescription: Location of menu directory containing menu textures and fonts etc
outputMenuDirectoryDescription: Location of menu directory containing menu textures and fonts etc
metadataDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will read and write metadata files like scene-graph.json, op-code-usages.json
inputSoundsDirectoryDescription: Location of the audio.dat and audio.fmt files
outputSoundsDirectoryDescription: Output location of the sound audio files
inputMusicDirectoryDescription: Location of music.idx and .wav music files
outputMusicDirectoryDescription: Output location of the music audio files
inputMoviecamDirectoryDescription: Location of files unpacked from movies/moviecam.lgp like biglight.cam
outputMoviesDirectoryDescription: Output location of the movie files
inputExeDescription: Location of exe for extracting strings, shop listings and other hardcoded data
outputExeDirectoryDescription: Location of exe directory containing text strings, shop listings and other hardcoded data
inputCreditsDescription: Location of extracted assets from cr_us.lgp
inputDiscDescription: Location of extracted assets from disc_us.lgp
outputCDDirectoryDescription: Location of exe directory containing text strings, shop listings and other hardcoded data
